_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate cookie consent banner/modal copy. Must be GDPR-compliant.
_meta.usage: Read by Claude to generate consent UI copies
_meta.note: Keep it simple and transparent. Explain what cookies do in plain language. Comply with GDPR.

banner.title: Banner heading. Be direct. Ex: 'We use cookies', 'Cookies on {site name}'
banner.description: Brief explanation of cookie use. Be transparent. Ex: 'We use cookies to personalize your experience and for marketing. You can manage your preferences anytime.'
banner.learnMore: Link to full policy. Ex: 'Learn more', 'Cookie Policy', 'More info'
banner.acceptAll: Button to accept all cookies. Ex: 'Accept all', 'Accept', 'OK'
banner.rejectAll: Button to reject non-essential. Ex: 'Reject all', 'Only necessary', 'Decline'
banner.customize: Button to open preferences. Ex: 'Customize', 'Manage preferences', 'Settings'

modal.title: Modal heading. Ex: 'Cookie preferences', 'Manage Cookies', 'Privacy Settings'
modal.description: Explanation with link to policy. Mention they can change later. Ex: 'Choose which cookies you want to allow. You can change these settings anytime. Read our'
modal.privacyPolicy: Link text to privacy policy. Ex: 'Privacy Policy', 'full policy'
modal.save: Button to save custom preferences. Ex: 'Save preferences', 'Save choices', 'Confirm'
modal.acceptAll: Button to accept all in modal. Ex: 'Accept all', 'Allow all'
modal.rejectAll: Button to reject all in modal. Ex: 'Reject all', 'Only necessary'

necessary.name: Category name. Ex: 'Necessary', 'Essential', 'Required'
necessary.description: Explain what necessary cookies do. Be specific. Ex: 'Essential for the site to work. Includes session, authentication, and personalization based on your referral source.'

marketing.name: Category name. Ex: 'Marketing', 'Advertising', 'Analytics & Ads'
marketing.description: Explain marketing cookies. Be transparent about what services. Ex: 'Help us measure ad performance and show you relevant content. Includes Google Ads and Meta Pixel.'

footer.privacy: Footer link to privacy policy. Ex: 'Privacy', 'Privacy Policy'
footer.manageCookies: Footer link to reopen preferences. Ex: 'Manage cookies', 'Cookie settings', 'Cookie preferences'
